name: Offroad Trike Rider - Free Atv Racing Game
name_original: Offroad Trike Rider - Free Atv Racing Game
description:
You are about to take on the most thrilling drive of your life on this brutal Enclosure where vigilance is order of the day and carelessness is death itself.

Drive beyond your imagination and rev up the gas towards enraged enemies.

Race against opponents and destroy them,Boost up your speed like no one else can! Fasten your seat belts. Get ready for the drive of your life!

It's gonna be a tough ride!

* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
* Dozens of enemies to destroy
